DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether PF-04383119 is effective in the treatment of pain associated with interstitial cystitis.
DOC.brief_title: An Effectiveness and Safety Study of PF-04383119 for the Treatment of Pain in Interstitial Cystitis
DOC.criteria: Male and female adults at least 18 years of age; Moderate to severe interstitial cystitis, with a mean pain intensity score above a predefined level. Less than 6 months since onset of interstitial cystitis symptoms; History of recurrent urinary tract infections, or genitourinary cancer; History of hepatitis B, C or human immunodeficiency virus (HIV); Use of certain drugs given into the bladder up to 1 month prior to study entry.
